Let’s get started.
8.1 Tutorial Overview
In this tutorial, we will explore how to develop CNN models for time series forecasting. The
models are demonstrated on small contrived time series problems intended to give the ﬂavor
of the type of time series problem being addressed. The chosen conﬁguration of the models is
